The DurakGame class¶

class Game.DurakGame(n_players: int, deckMode: str)¶

Bases: Game.Game

State machine for game of Durak.

begin_game()¶

Deck is first shuffled, then 6 cards are dealt to each of the players. Finally the game’s Field object is initialized.

get_action_size(playerID)¶

Available actions given player

Parameters

playerID (int) – index for player

get_deck_from_hand(hand: numpy.ndarray) → Cards.Deck¶

Convert a hand into a deck object.

Parameters

hand (np.ndarray) – An n_suit by n_val array.

Returns

A Deck instance, populated with cards inside the hand.

Return type

deck (Deck)

get_game_ended()¶

Will return True when game is over.

get_hand_from_deck(deck: Cards.Deck) → numpy.ndarray¶

Convert a deck into a “hand”, which is a 2d np.ndarray whose first row is always trump suit.

Parameters

deck (Deck) – A Deck instance.

Returns

An deck.n_suit by deck.n_val np.ndarray

Return type

hand (np.ndarray)

The DurakField class¶

class Field.DurakField(deck, players)¶

Bases: Field.Field

This class defines legal moves you can make in a game of Durak, given every players’ hands and the current cards played on the field.
